title: National Football League Stadiums
description: Who's ready for some footall? Each stadium in the NFL is unique, that's for sure.  This is Ordered alphabetically by stadium name, and only includes the current stadium for each team.

questEntries.title: Arrowhead Stadium (Kansas City Chiefs)
questEntries.description: Arrowhead Stadium has a capacity of 76,416 (as of 2018) and is located in Kansas City, Missouri.  It has an open roof with a Latitude 36 Bermuda Grass playing surface.

questEntries.title: AT&T Stadium (Dallas Cowboys)
questEntries.description: AT&T Stadium has a capacity of 80,000 (as of 2018) and is located in Arlington, Texas.  It has a retractable roof with a Matrix RealGrass artificial turf playing surface.

questEntries.title: Bank of America Stadium (Carolina Panthers)
questEntries.description: Bank of America Stadium has a capacity of 75,419 (as of 2018) and is located in Charlotte, North Carolina.  It has an open roof with a Voyager Bermuda Grass playing surface.

questEntries.title: CenturyLink Field (Seattle Seahawks)
questEntries.description: CenturyLink Field has a capacity of 68,000 (as of 2018) and is located in Seattle, Washington.  It has an open roof with a FieldTurf Revolution playing surface.

questEntries.title: FedEx Field (Washington Redskins)
questEntries.description: FedEx Field has a capacity of 82,000 (as of 2018) and is located in Landover, Maryland.  It has an open roof with a Latitude 36 Bermuda Grass playing surface.

questEntries.title: FirstEnergy Stadium (Cleveland Browns)
questEntries.description: FirstEnergy Stadium has a capacity of 67,895 (as of 2018) and is located in Cleveland, Ohio.  It has an open roof with a Kentucky Bluegrass playing surface.

questEntries.title: Ford Field (Detroit Lions)
questEntries.description: Ford Field has a capacity of 65,000 (as of 2018) and is located in Detroit, Michigan.  It has a fixed roof with a FieldTurf Classic HD playing surface.

questEntries.title: Gillette Stadium (New England Patriots)
questEntries.description: Gillette Stadium has a capacity of 66,829 (as of 2018) and is located in Foxborough, Massachusetts.  It has a open roof with a FieldTurf Revolution playing surface.

questEntries.title: Hard Rock Stadium (Miami Dolphins)
questEntries.description: Hard Rock Stadium has a capacity of 65,326 (as of 2018) and is located in Miami Gardens, Florida.  It has an open roof with a Platinum TE Paspalum playing surface.

questEntries.title: Heinz Field (Pittsburgh Steelers)
questEntries.description: Heinz Field has a capacity of 68,400 (as of 2018) and is located in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.  It has an open roof with a Kentucky Bluegrass playing surface.

questEntries.title: Lambeau Field (Green Bay Packers)
questEntries.description: Lambeau Field has a capacity of 81,435 (as of 2018) and is located in Green Bay, Wisconsin.  It has an open roof with a Desso GrassMaster playing surface.

questEntries.title: Levi's Stadium (San Francisco 49ers)
questEntries.description: Levi's Stadium has a capacity of 68,500 (as of 2018) and is located in Santa Clara, California.  It has an open roof with a Tifway II Bermuda Grass / Perennial Ryegrass mixture playing surface.

questEntries.title: Lincoln Financial Field (Philadelphia Eagles)
questEntries.description: Lincoln Financial Field has a capacity of 69,596 (as of 2018) and is located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.  It has a open roof with a Desso GrassMaster playing surface.

questEntries.title: Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum (Los Angeles Rams)
questEntries.description: Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum has a capacity of 93,607 (as of 2018) and is located in Los Angeles, California.  It has an open roof with a Santa Ana Bermuda Grass playing surface.

questEntries.title: Lucas Oil Stadium (Indianapolis Colts)
questEntries.description: Lucas Oil Stadium has a capacity of 67,000 (as of 2018) and is located in Indianapolis, Indiana.  It has a rectractable roof with a FieldTurf Classic HD playing surface.

questEntries.title: M&T Bank Stadium (Baltimore Ravens)
questEntries.description: M&T Bank Stadium has a capacity of 71,008 (as of 2018) and is located in Baltimore, Maryland.  It has an open roof with a Tifway 419 Bermuda Grass playing surface.

questEntries.title: Mercedes-Benz Stadium (Atlanta Falcons)
questEntries.description: Mercedes-Benz Stadium has a capacity of 71,000 (as of 2018) and is located in Atlanta, Georgia.  It has a retractable roof with a FieldTurf Revolution playing surface.

questEntries.title: Mercedes-Benz Superdome (New Orleans Saints)
questEntries.description: Mercedes-Benz Superdome has a capacity of 73,208 (as of 2018) and is located in New Orleans, Louisiana.  It has a fixed roof with a UBU Sports Speed Series S5-M Synthetic Turf playing surface.

questEntries.title: MetLife Stadium (New York Giants)
questEntries.description: MetLife Stadium has a capacity of 82,500 (as of 2018) and is located in East Rutherford, New Jersey.  It has an open roof with a UBU Sports Speed Series S5-M Synthetic Turf playing surface.

questEntries.title: MetLife Stadium (New York Jets)
questEntries.description: MetLife Stadium has a capacity of 82,500 (as of 2018) and is located in East Rutherford, New Jersey.  It has an open roof with a UBU Sports Speed Series S5-M Synthetic Turf playing surface.

questEntries.title: New Era Field (Buffalo Bills)
questEntries.description: New Era Field has a capacity of 71,608 (as of 2018) and is located in Orchard Park, New York.  It has a open roof with a A-Turf Titan 50 (artificial) playing surface.

questEntries.title: Nissan Stadium (Tennessee Stadium)
questEntries.description: Nissan Stadium has a capacity of 69,143 (as of 2018) and is located in Nashville, Tennessee.  It has an open roof with a TifSport Bermuda Grass playing surface.

questEntries.title: NRG Stadium (Houston Texans)
questEntries.description: NRG Stadium has a capacity of 72,220 (as of 2018) and is located in Houston, Texas.  It has a retractable roof with a UBU Sports Speed Series S5-M Synthetic Turf playing surface.

questEntries.title: Oakland–Alameda County Coliseum (Oakland Raiders)
questEntries.description: Oakland–Alameda County Coliseum has a capacity of 53,286 (as of 2018) and is located in Oakland, California.  It has an open roof with a Tifway II Bermuda Grass playing surface.

questEntries.title: Paul Brown Stadium (Cincinnati Bengals)
questEntries.description: Paul Brown Stadium has a capacity of 65,515 (as of 2018) and is located in Cincinnati, Ohio.  It has an open roof with a UBU Speed Series S5-M Synthetic Turf playing surface.

questEntries.title: Raymond James Stadium (Tampa Bay Buccaneers)
questEntries.description: Raymond James Stadium has a capacity of 65,890 (as of 2018) and is located in Tampa, Florida.  It has an open roof with a Tifway 419 Bermuda Grass playing surface.

questEntries.title: Soldier Field (Chicago Bears)
questEntries.description: Soldier Field has a capacity of 61,500 (as of 2018) and is located in Chicago, Illinois.  It has an open roof with a Kentucky Bluegrass playing surface.

questEntries.title: Sports Authority Field at Mile High (Denver Broncos)
questEntries.description: Sports Authority Field has a capacity of 76,125 (as of 2018) and is located in Denver, Colorado.  It has an open roof with a Kentucky Bluegrass playing surface.

questEntries.title: StubHub Center (Los Angeles Chargers)
questEntries.description: StubHub Center has a capacity of 27,000 (as of 2018) and is located in Carson, California.  It has an open roof with a Bandera Bermuda Grass playing surface.

questEntries.title: TIAA Bank Field (Jacksonville Jaguars)
questEntries.description: TIAA Bank Field has a capacity of 67,246 (as of 2018) and is located in Jacksonville, Florida.  It has an open roof with a Tifway 419 Bermuda Grass playing surface.

questEntries.title: University of Phoenix Stadium (Arizona Cardinals)
questEntries.description: University of Phoenix Stadium has a capacity of 63,400 (as of 2018) and is located in Glendale, Arizona.  It has a retractable roof with a Tifway 419 Bermuda Grass playing surface.

questEntries.title: U.S. Bank Stadium (Minnesota Vikings)
questEntries.description: U.S. Bank Stadium has a capacity of 66,655 (as of 2018) and is located in Minneapolis, Minnesota.  It has a fixed roof with a UBU Speed Series S5-M Synthetic Turf playing surface.
